name: One Bullet (SeanFowke)
description:
One Bullet is a stealth/puzzle game about redirecting a single sniper bullet to kill two enemies in a room. Sneak past enemies using your sniper vision, reposition reflective surfaces, and cause distractions.

Controls:

WASD = Move

F = Interact with the sniper and green barrel distractions

Left Click = Reposition Reflective Surfaces and shoot the sniper

Right Click = Rotate the reflective surface while in grab mode

E = Sniper Vision

Credits:

Game Designer and Programmer: Sean Fowke

Sniper Reticle: Kelly Ashton

Sounds retrived at Soundbible.com

Music: Spy Glass by Kevin Mcleod
